function About() { return ( <>

Who are we

TL Productions NPO is a Non-Profitable Organization that was founded in 2012 with the objective of providing craft skills training & personal development for Women & Youth in the Northern Cape. Arts & Crafts have the potential to create jobs, lift people out of poverty & also sustain their livelihoods, especially in the Northern Cape where most of the Youth is currently unemployed.Arts & Crafts Has an effective economical programme to empower women & youth from disadvanged communities especially in rural areas & equipping them with the skills neede to overcome poverty and social skills.

) } export default About
